value: Captain TJ is a hardworking pupper. Your job is to pamper him. Brush him for 10 seconds
Can you welcome the aliens ?. Mind that they come with their own drones. Use the AR app Visiting Friends menu
Make sure all the doors in the house are closed
White contains all colors. More colors means more information. Please make sure our white light circuit is working
We need ventilation, Open all the doors lieutenant
There seems a shortage in O2 supplies. Check the oxygen level. Use the AR app Admin:Check Status menu and find the oxygen tag
Make sure our friends on Mars are safe and working. Use the AR app Make them work menu
We are under attack. Pot one ball on the snooker table
We need to prepare and send a signal, set the pool table
Our star has 25 neighbours, take a selfie with the stars. Make sure you also include our space ship
Have you scanned yourself for the virus ? Use the AR app Admin:Check Status menu and find the drone
Say helo to your mates on Mars. Use the AR app Admin:Check Status menu and find the astronaut
Check if our electrical volcanic fissure system is working. Use the AR app Admin: Check Status menu and find the fissures
